info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 26 at 1:27AM EST until November 26 at 3:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and poor drainage flooding caused by heavy rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following county, Bay.
* WHEN...Until 230 AM CST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1226 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and poor drainage flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Dirego Park, Cedar Grove, Millville, Magnolia Beach, Bay Harbor, Brannonville, College Station, St Andrews State Park, Biltmore Beach, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Bayou George and West Panama City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING
